strapiPost.title: House Cured Culinary Offers Private Chef Services At Home
strapiPost.content:
We love sharing new, unique businesses in NWA, but it's always better when they involve delicious, chef made food prepared in your home. When we heard about House Cured Culinary, we booked immediately!

  • Evening to remember: Chef Kevin McCombs recently moved to NWA, where he brought his family and business, House Cured Culinary â€” a private chef service he founded in Colorado over a decade ago. We invited eight friends over to celebrate a birthday, and the four-course menu and experience was top notch.
  • Special occasion: Chef Kevin arrived with fresh food, was entertainment the entire evening, and left with our kitchen cleaner than when he arrived. His services are perfect for a small to medium size gathering. We ended the night dreaming of opportunities to ask Chef Kevin to return.

Learn more about House Cured Culinary and book your private chef service HERE.
